name: Splice
tagline: Genetic engineers Clive Nicoli and Elsa Kast hope to achieve fame by successfully splicing together the DNA of different animals to create new hybrid animals for medical use.

name: Rock Star
tagline: Lead singer of a tribute band becomes lead singer of the real band he idolizes.

name: The Counselor
tagline: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

name: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton!
tagline: A small-town girl wins a date with a male celebrity through a contest. When the date goes better than expected, a love triangle forms between the girl, the male celebrity, and the girl's best friend.

name: Boiler Room
tagline: A college dropout gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm, which puts him on the fast track to success, but the job might not be as legitimate as it sounds.

name: 88 Minutes

production.name: Equity Pictures Medienfonds GmbH & Co. KG III

tagline: On the day that a serial killer that he helped put away is supposed to be executed, a noted forensic psychologist and college professor receives a call informing him that he has 88 minutes left to live.

name: Serving Sara
tagline: A process server tries to serve an elusive female target.

name: Crazy/Beautiful
tagline: At Pacific Palisades High, a poor Latino falls hard for a troubled girl from the affluent neighborhood.

name: The Thing
tagline: At an Antarctica research site, the discovery of an alien craft leads to a confrontation between graduate student Kate Lloyd and scientist Dr. Sander Halvorson.

name: The Devil's Rejects

production.name: Cinelamda Internationale Filmproduktionsgesellschaft mbH & Co. 1 Beteiligungs-KG

tagline: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family takes to the road to escape a vengeful police force which isn't afraid of being as ruthless as their target.

name: Looking for Mr. Goodbar
tagline: A dedicated schoolteacher spends her nights cruising bars, looking for abusive men with whom she can engage in progressively violent sexual encounters.

name: Go
tagline: Go! tells the story of the events after a drug deal, told from three different points of view.

name: Wimbledon
tagline: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

name: Andre
tagline: The true story of how a marine sea lion named Andre befriended a little girl and her family, circa 1962.

name: Rebound
tagline: An acclaimed college hoops coach is demoted to a junior varsity team after a public meltdown.

name: Oliver!
tagline: Musical adaptation about an orphan who runs away from an orphanage and hooks up with a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.

name: The Motorcycle Diaries
tagline: The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.

name: Catch That Kid
tagline: A girl and her two friends raid a bank, looking for the money needed for financing the cure of her dying father.

name: New in Town
tagline: A Miami businesswoman adjusts to her new life in a tiny Minnesota town.

name: To Rome with Love
tagline: The lives of some visitors and residents of Rome and the romances, adventures and predicaments they get into.

name: Hellraiser: Bloodline
tagline: In the 22nd century, a scientist attempts to right the wrong his ancestor created: the puzzle box that opens the gates of Hell and unleashes Pinhead and his Cenobite legions.

name: Tremors
tagline: Natives of a small isolated town defend themselves against strange underground creatures which are killing them one by one.

name: Unaccompanied Minors
tagline: A group of unaccompanied minors bond while snowed in at the midwestern Hoover International Airport during the holiday season and ultimately create a makeshift holiday themselves.

name: Bringing Out the Dead
tagline: A Manhattan ambulance paramedic, overworked and haunted by visions of his failures, fights to keep a tenuous grip on his clarity.

name: True Crime
tagline: Can an over-the-hill journalist uncover the evidence that can prove a death row inmate's innocence just hours before his execution?

name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
tagline: A flighty teenage girl learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

name: Heart and Souls
tagline: A businessman is reunited with the four lost souls who were his guardian angels during childhood, all with a particular purpose to joining the afterlife.
Famous 70s NYC nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

name: Shocker
tagline: After being sent to the electric chair, a serial killer uses electricity to come back from the dead and carry out his vengeance on the football player who turned him in to the police.

name: Dead Silence
tagline: A widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a murdered ventriloquist.

name: The Frighteners
tagline: After a tragic car accident that killed his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead to con people but when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.

name: Trainspotting

production.name: The Noel Gay Motion Picture Company

tagline: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

name: Spacehunter: Adventures in the Forbidden Zone
Terminal Velocity
tagline: A maverick skydiver and a former KGB agent team up to stop the Russian mafia from stealing gold.

name: Eye of the Beholder
tagline: A private eye shadows a female serial killer of men all over the U.S. without her knowing as he, strangely enough, occasionally acts as her guardian angel.

name: Sergeant York
tagline: True story of a hillbilly sharpshooter drafted in WW1 despite his claim to be a pacifist, who ends up becoming a war hero.

name: The Master
tagline: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.

name: Defending Your Life
tagline: In an afterlife resembling the present-day US, people must prove their worth by showing in court how they have demonstrated courage.

name: White Oleander
tagline: A teenager journeys through a series of foster homes after her mother goes to prison for committing a crime of passion.

name: Monkey Trouble
tagline: A young girl's life turns hairy when her new pet monkey turns out to be a trained pickpocket on the run from a scheming gypsy.

name: That Old Feeling
tagline: A bride's divorced parents find their old feelings for each other during the wedding reception and over the course of the next few days upsetting the newlywed's honeymoon.

name: Tales from the Darkside: The Movie
tagline: In anthology style, a child tells three stories of horror to keep from being eaten by a witch.

name: The Whole Ten Yards
tagline: Jimmy the Tulip's (Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Perry), whose wife (Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Peet) spring into action.

name: A Simple Plan
tagline: When three blue collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash they make a plan to keep their find from the authorities but find complications and mistrust weaving its way into their plan.

name: Young Adult
tagline: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend, who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.

name: Weird Science
tagline: Two high school nerds attempt to create the perfect woman, but she turns out to be more than that.

name: An American Haunting
tagline: Based on the true events of the only case in US History where a spirit caused the death of a man.

name: Howard the Duck
tagline: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invader.

name: Muppets from Space
tagline: Gonzo is contacted by his alien family through his breakfast cereal. He is kidnapped and it's up to Kermit and the gang to rescue Gonzo and help reunite him with his long-lost family.

name: Swing Vote
tagline: In a remarkable turn-of-events, the result of the presidential election comes down to one man's vote.

name: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
tagline: A mature Queen Elizabeth endures multiple crises late in her reign including court intrigues, an assassination plot, the Spanish Armada, and romantic disappointments.

name: Crossing Delancey
tagline: A Manhattan single meets a man through her Jewish grandmother's matchmaker.

name: Original Sin
tagline: A young man is plunged into a life of subterfuge, deceit and mistaken identity in pursuit of a femme fatale whose heart is never quite within his grasp. Remake of François Truffaut's 1969 film 'Mississippi Mermaid'

name: Supercop
tagline: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

name: 21 Grams
tagline: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

name: Black Christmas
tagline: An escaped maniac returns to his childhood home on Christmas Eve, which is now a sorority house, and begins to murder the sorority sisters one by one.

name: Raw Deal
tagline: A former FBI agent turned small town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by the Chicago Mafia.

name: Jennifer's Body
tagline: A newly possessed cheerleader turns into a killer who specializes in offing her male classmates. Can her best friend put an end to the horror?

name: I Love You to Death
tagline: Joey owns a pizza parlor, and is married to Rosalee, and is a major womanizer. Rosalee goes to extremes when she finds he has been cheating.

name: Wolf Creek
tagline: Stranded backpackers in remote Australia fall prey to a murderous bushman who offers to fix their car, then takes them captive.

name: Mo' Better Blues
tagline: Jazz trumpeter Bleek Gilliam makes questionable decisions in his professional and romantic life.

name: A Haunted House 2
tagline: Having exorcised the demons of his ex, Malcolm is starting fresh with his new girlfriend and her two children. After moving into their dream home, however, Malcolm is once again plagued by bizarre paranormal events.

name: Vanity Fair
tagline: Growing up poor in London, Becky Sharp (Witherspoon) defies her poverty-stricken background and ascends the social ladder alongside her best friend, Amelia.

name: Bright Lights, Big City
tagline: A disillusioned young writer living in New York City turns to drugs and drinking to block out the memories of his dead mother and estranged wife.

name: Jobs
tagline: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.

name: The Prophecy
tagline: The angel Gabriel comes to Earth to collect a soul which will end the stalemated war in Heaven, and only a former priest and a little girl can stop him.

name: Waiting...
tagline: Young employees at Shenaniganz restaurant collectively stave off boredom and adulthood with their antics.

name: Fruitvale Station
tagline: The purportedly true story of Oscar Grant III, a 22-year-old Bay Area resident, who crosses paths with friends, enemies, family, and strangers on the last day of 2008.

name: Imagine That
tagline: A financial executive who can't stop his career downspiral is invited into his daughter's imaginary world, where solutions to his problems await.

name: Dr. No
tagline: A resourceful government agent seeks answers in a case involving a missing colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

name: A Midsummer Night's Dream
tagline: Lovers lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

name: Above the Rim
tagline: Story of a promising high school basketball star and his relationships with two brothers, one a drug dealer and the other a former basketball star fallen on hard times and now employed as a security guard.

name: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
tagline: A rough-around-the-edges martial arts master seeks revenge for his parent's death.

name: Devil in a Blue Dress
tagline: An Afro-American man is hired to find a woman and gets mixed up in a murderous political scandal.

name: Adventureland
tagline: In the summer of 1987, a college graduate takes a 'nowhere' job at his local amusement park, only to find it's the perfect course to get him prepared for the real world.

name: O
tagline: An update of Shakespeare's 'Othello' with a young cast, set in a high school and centered around basketball player Odin.

name: Rocky III
tagline: Rocky has been holding the title as the heavyweight champion until he is defeated by a brutal challenger, and now must regain his fighting spirit through a big rematch, trained by an unlikely ally: his old nemesis Apollo Creed.
